title: Week 9 Quiz: Security
description: Assess your knowledge of digital banking security and fraud types.

items.prompt: Which of these is NOT a biometric factor?
items.explanation: A password is something you know, not a biological trait.

items.prompt: If a criminal calls you pretending to be from the fraud department, it is:

items.explanation: SSL is the standard technology for keeping an internet connection secure.

items.prompt: 2FA usually involves a password and a ___ sent to your phone.
items.explanation: Most 2FA systems send a one-time code via SMS or an app.

items.prompt: Which term describes 'converting data into a secret code'?
items.explanation: Encryption is the process of encoding information.
